skins.shipDescription: First ship of the Nagara-class light cruisers, Nagara.
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm the first ship of the Nagara-class light cruisers from the Sakura Empire. I took part in various battles in the Solomon Seas and in the center Pacific. During Midway, I took over Akagi's role as flagship after she sank and then coordinated our retreat. In the end, though, I too met the fate of being sunk by a submarine...
skins.acquisition: Eheh, I'm Nagara. Commader, have you been anticipating my arrival?
skins.login: Hey, hey~ Commander, were you daydreaming again?
skins.details: What kind of girl do you like, Commander? Hehe. Oh yeah?
skins.secretaryIdle1: You need to change clothes after getting soaked... Hey, do you want to borrow mine?
skins.secretaryIdle2: It's great that Abukuma is finally making friends, but...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander~ Your face is so~ cute~!
skins.secretaryTouch: Have you run into any trouble, Commander?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Sometimes I really don't understand what you're trying to do, Commander...

skins.shipDescription: Good evening, Commander. This room...? Ah, it's a special Dragon Empery-themed set I bought from Akashi's. It looked pretty snazzy and was on sale, so I picked it up. Ehehe~
skins.acquisition: Good evening, Commander. This room...? Ah, it's a special Dragon Empery-themed set I bought from Akashi's. It looked pretty snazzy and was on sale, so I picked it up. Ehehe~
skins.details: Commander, how do you plan on spending your Spring Festival? Me? ...Well, chilling in my room with a cup of tea sounds pretty good, or reading a book, or rolling around. Ehehe~
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, have you seen Kinu? I told her I'd clean her ears, but she bailed quick... Seriously, what's wrong with cleaning your sister's ears...?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, you know, Abukuma started having tea with me, and will even let me clean her ears! Ehehe, th
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, want me to clean your ears too? Sure, come here then~ *pat* *pat*
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Jeez, Commander, don't blame me if I poke a hole in your eardrum~
